directions: Cook tomatillos in large pot of boiling water until soft but still whole, about 3 minutes. Drain. Place tomatillos in large bowl and refrigerate until cold, about 1 hour.
Place tomatillos in blender. Add remaining ingredients. Blend until smooth. Transfer dip to bowl. Cover with plastic and refrigerate until cold. (Can be prepared 6 hours ahead.)
ingredients: 1 1/2 medium jalape&;ntilde;o chilies, stemmed, seeded, chopped
title: Tomatillo-Avocado Dip
